content: 2 treble_crochet in the corner chain 1 i repeat from * to * 3 more times once per side j join with 1 slip_stitch to the second treble_crochet of the round totals 120 pairs each pair = 2 treble_crochet + chain 1 30 per side 16 treble_crochet 4 per corner 8 slip_stitch 2 per side 4 chain-1 space 1 per corner 63 -
